name: Zedex
description: The Zedex (ZEX) token aims to revolutionize decentralized ecosystems by combining blockchain, digital finance, and immersive technologies. Built on the Binance Smart Chain (BSC), Zedex offers a multi-faceted ecosystem for users across industries like e-commerce, decentralized finance (DeFi), and gaming. With a focus on creating value for token holders, ZEX aims to become the backbone of this digital economy, offering utility, governance, and rewards through its tokenomics and smart contract integration.
